articles.title: Google NotebookLM adds ‘Mind Maps' and ‘output language' features
articles.author: GCC Business News
articles.summary: Google NotebookLM is getting new features to offer modern ways of interacting with the artificial intelligence (AI) platform. The most notable feature is Mind Maps, which creates a flow chart of the concepts discussed in the content source and allows users to visualize them.

articles.title: AI breakthrough slashes celiac disease diagnosis time from months to minutes
articles.author: Natural News
articles.summary: Cambridge researchers created an AI tool diagnosing celiac disease as accurately as human pathologists in under a minute. The AI achieved this by using an advanced machine learning technology.      .   for the first time in the history of medicine.

articles.title: AI's short-term impact exaggerated, long-term underestimated: Dr Devi Shetty
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: AI will have an impact only after 10 years, says Dr Devi Shetty, chairperson, board of governors, Indian Institute of Management Bangalore. Dr Shetty was speaking at the 50th convocation of the institute on Friday. Shetty believes AI will not change the world as it is projected.

articles.title: Government setting up AI think tank to shape future policies

articles.summary: The government is establishing a think tank focused on artificial intelligence to guide policies that will enable the country to leverage the technology, the National Economic and Development Authority said. The think tank will focus on the country's future use of artificial intelligence technology.

articles.title: 688th Cyberspace Wing Charters AI Initiative to Enhance Mission Effectiveness
articles.author: Kyle Burns
articles.summary: The 688th Cyberspace Wing has formally launched an artificial intelligence initiative. The initiative prioritizes responsible AI development through policy alignment, resource optimization, and workforce development. The wing is the Air Force's premier cyberspace warfighting organization dedicated to delivering actionable intelligence and tactics, techniques, and procedures.

articles.title: Is Getting an AI Agent for Your Machine Tools a Good Idea?
articles.author: Dennis Scimeca
articles.summary: In an agentic AI model, rather than a trigger telling a control function to slow down the machine, you actually have the machinery recognizing that the input speed has slowed down. It's unfortunate what's going to happen to low- to medium-skilled jobs. Manufacturing industry is going to try to reap the benefit of replacing low-skilled operators with higher-skilled experts.
